general_2_0.source: The weather forecast predicts heavy rainfall throughout the weekend.

general_2_1.source: The new restaurant downtown offers a fusion of Mediterranean and Asian cuisine.

general_2_2.source: Public transportation services will be limited during the upcoming holiday.

general_2_3.source: The local community center is hosting a workshop on sustainable gardening next month.

general_2_4.source: Scientists have discovered a new species of butterfly in the Amazon rainforest.

general_2_5.source: The annual music festival will feature both international and local artists this year.
